 10#ifndef VSIP_CORE_SOLVER_LLSQSOL_HPP
 11#define VSIP_CORE_SOLVER_LLSQSOL_HPP
 12
 13/***********************************************************************
 14  Included Files
 15***********************************************************************/
 16
 17#include <vsip/core/metaprogramming.hpp>
 18#include <vsip/matrix.hpp>
 19#include <vsip/core/solver/qr.hpp>
 20
 21#define VSIP_IMPL_USE_QRD_LSQSOL 1
 22
 23
 24
 25/***********************************************************************
 26  Declarations
 27***********************************************************************/
 28
 29namespace vsip
 30{
 31
 32/// Solver least-squares system min_x norm-2 (A x - b), return x by reference.
 33///
 34/// Requires
 35///   A to be an M x N full-rank matrix
 36///   B to be an M x P matrix.
 37///   X to be an N x P matrix.
 38
 39template <typename T,
 40	  typename Block0,
 41	  typename Block1,
 42	  typename Block2>
 43Matrix<T, Block2>
 44llsqsol(
 45  Matrix<T, Block0>       a,
 46  const_Matrix<T, Block1> b,
 47  Matrix<T, Block2>       x)
 48VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc, computation_error))
 49{
 50  length_type m = a.size(0);
 51  length_type n = a.size(1);
 52
 53
 54  // p = b.size(1)
 55
 56  // b should be (m, p)
 57  assert(b.size(0) == m);
 58  assert(b.size(1) == b.size(1));
 59    
 60  // x should be (n, p)
 61  assert(x.size(0) == n);
 62  assert(x.size(1) == b.size(1));
 63    
 64
 65  storage_type qrd_type;
 66
 67  // Determine whether to use skinny or full QR.
 68  if (impl::Qrd_traits<qrd<T, by_reference> >::supports_qrd_saveq1)
 69    qrd_type = qrd_saveq1;
 70  else if (impl::Qrd_traits<qrd<T, by_reference> >::supports_qrd_saveq)
 71    qrd_type = qrd_saveq;
 72  else
 73    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(impl::unimplemented(
 74	      "llsqsol: qrd supports neither qrd_saveq1 or qrd_saveq"));
 75  
 76  qrd<T, by_reference> qr(m, n, qrd_type);
 77  
 78  qr.decompose(a);
 79  
 80  qr.lsqsol(b, x);
 81
 82  return x;
 83}
 84
 85
 86
 87template <typename T,
 88	  typename Block0,
 89	  typename Block1>
 90Matrix<T>
 91llsqsol(
 92  Matrix<T, Block0>       a,
 93  const_Matrix<T, Block1> b)
 94VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc, computation_error))
 95{
 96  Matrix<T> x(a.size(1), b.size(1));
 97  llsqsol(a, b, x);
 98  return x;
 99}
100
101} // namespace vsip
102
103#endif // VSIP_CORE_SOLVER_LLSQSOL_HPP
